key.name: font
key.description: The font name set here will be used as the font when displaying notes.

key.name: use-system-font
key.summary: Whether to use the system monospace font

key.name: color
key.description: The color name set here will be used as the color when creating new notes.

key.name: default-location
key.summary: Primary notes provider to use for new notes.
key.description: The primary notebook is the place where new notes are created.

key.name: last-opened-item
key.summary: Note path of the notes opened when Notes quits last time.
key.description: This stores the note path of the last opened item, so that we can open it on startup.

key.name: text-size
key.summary: Text size used by note editor.
key.description: There are three text sizes available: small, medium (default) and large.
